definitions.definition: a piece of work to be done or undertaken.
examples: job, duty, chore, charge, assignment, detail, mission, engagement, occupation, undertaking, exercise, business, responsibility, burden, endeavor, enterprise, venture a daunting task

definitions.definition: assign a piece of work to.
examples: NATO troops are tasked with separating the warring parties

definitions.definition: make great demands on (someone's resources or abilities).
examples: it tasked his diplomatic skill to effect his departure in safety
